definitions.su1: see 囉囌|啰苏[luo1 su1]; variant of 蘇|苏[su1]; to revive; Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil); place name; to revive; used as phonetic in transliteration; old variant of 蘇|苏[su1];
definitions.Su1: surname Su; abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联; abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏; abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州;
